title: Skin Not owned
body: i have been gifted by one of my friends a pool party fiora and i played with it couple of times and now when i was in champ select it says not owned or locked i don't know if that's a bug but please help me with this one

replies.body: I went to look into this for you, but I wasn't able to locate the skin.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look into this with you individually.  Hang on until then!
